1.content:
Hansa- Hansa is older than Gretal by one year. Hansa is a skinny 17 year old who likes being outside. Weight: 100 Height: 5'7

Gretal- Gretal is a typical 16 year old girl. Gretal was always a little pudgy because she wasnt afraid to eat food when it came to her. Weight: 120 Height: 5'6
1.title: Hansa and Gretal

choices: They meet an old lady in the woods
11.content: Our story begins with Hansa and Gretel starting their hike into a forest. About an hour into the hike they feel a little hungry. However when they look in their bags they realize they forgot to pack food. They try calling their dad but there is no reception. They then decide to try and go back the way they came, however little did they know they were lost. Within an hour...
11.title: Lets begin!

choices: A skinny, old woman comes out
A plump, middle-aged woman come out
1131.content: Hansa and Gretel are so hungry they immediately start eating the house. As they ate, Gretel's already soft stomach was slowly becoming a round beach ball of a belly that pressed against her already somewhat tight button up blouse. However due to her hunger, she did not notice at all that there was anything wrong. Her sister, Hansa, on the other hand, realized soon after she started eating that she was still hungry even after consuming a rather large quantity of food, especially by her standards. She tried to warn Gretel, but she was too busy eating. Soon Hansa's hunger also took hold of her once again and she resumed her consumption of the delectable home. However, both girls stop eating when...
1131.title: Start eating the house

choices: No, havent you heard of stranger danger
11311.content: The girls stopped when they heard someone yelling at them. When they turned around they saw a pretty, skinny, old woman. The old woman asked them softly," Why are you eating my house?" Hansa turned around and told the old woman, "We were really hungry because we left all of our hiking equipment and food at home and we got lost." "Oh well why didn't you tell me, I would be happy to feed you poor dears, why don't you into my house and we can talk about lunch." Do they?
11311.title: An old woman came out

choices: Matilda lead them into a room
113112.content: The girls are pretty hungry still so they decide to take up the offer. When they got inside they noticed every thing was made from candy. However things got weirder still because as the old woman started fixing some food, Hansa and Gretal started feeling more and more hungry. By the time the old woman finished the food Hansa and Gretal were drooling from the smell. As she was bringing out the food Hansa asked the old woman,"What is your name?" The old woman answered with a hearty, " Matilda, and yours?" "My name is Hansa, and this is Gretal." After that nobody really talked because the girls were too busy eating. Matilda watched as Gretal had to unbutton her pants because her once small potbelly started looking so big that it looked as if she had swallowed a beach ball. Matilda also watched as Hansa's shirt kept riding up because her new small potbelly. When they had finally stopped...
113112.title: Yes, they are really hungry

1131121.content:
Both Hansa and Gretal drifted off into a food-induced coma, despite both their bellies having painfully reached capacity. The witch only smiled. She lifted Hansa, took her to a small room, and set her down on the hay-covered floor. The witch felt at Hansa's bloated belly, noting the tautness and little amount of fat present. She locked the door behind her as she left to fetch the other girl.

Moving Gretal proved to be more difficult, as the far plumper child weighed much more than Hansa. With a grunt, the witch lifted her as well, and took her into another, similar room, setting her down onto the hay. This pig wouldn't need much encouragement to become a nice pot-bellied roast, but the smaller one would need to be force fed, most likely. The witch left the room, once again locking the door behind her as she walked toward the kitchen to start working on the next day's meals.
1131121.title: They both began to feel drowsy...

1131122.content: "Theres more food in this room," said Matilda. Then she led them into a room that looked like a jail. Then she asked, "Which of you would like to eat first?"
1131122.title: Matilda lead them into a room

choices: They both go to the old woman's house
114.content:
After an hour of walking through vast and silent woods, the girls came across a strange sight: a visibly old woman was picking mushrooms and appears out of nowhere.

-Hey, old lady! shouted Gretel. My friend and I are lost since one two hours and we don't know where we are...

-What we do know is that we are quite hungry, said desesperatly Hansa. Please, do you have some food and some way to contact our dad?

The old woman took a good look on the two sisters. It has been quite a while since the last time she got kids in these woods. These two girls were young and tender. The shorter one, Hansa, seems to have 16 years old and was pretty thin; nothing to get excited about. As for her older sister, Gretel, she was 19 years old and wasn'rt much bigger; she just had more curves. After some weeks, they could be quite a good diner...

-Oh my sweet children, you should come to my house, replied the old woman. I have a lot food and a roof for you. I don't have any phone, but we could figure out something when we are there, no?

The two sisters looked at each other.

-I'm down, says Hansa. We should go.

-Yeah...but I'm still suspicious, replied Gretel.

-Do you really prefer to stay in these woods? It would be dark soon.

-Yeah...
114.title: They meet an old lady in the woods

1141.content:
The little group shortly arrived to the old woman's house. It was a small cottage, with a garden in the backyard.When they step inside, the old woman presented herself:

-You can call me Granny. I had live here for the past twenty years...Would you like somethin to eat?

-You bet! replied Hansa.

The two girls sat at the table and waited. Soon enough, the old lay bring back a lot of food, which they devor.

"Soon, they are going to be all jiggly and chubby for me...I can't wait to see their bacon" salived the old woman.
1141.title: They both go to the old woman's house

11412.content:
Hansa and Gretel stayed one month in complete pleasure at Granny's house. The ate all kind of different food, from caloric pastries to meaty pie.
Unknown to the girls, they gained a bit of weight.
Gretel was way meatier and entering the chubby phase. Her hips had grown wider over the past few weeks, as had her backside, which was bouncing slightly behind her. Her jeans were stretched tight around her thicker waist and soon to be ripped. Her belly was rounder and soft.
Granny was salivating at the look of the young pumpler.
"Three more months at best and she is going to make a perfect centerpiece for a real feast! Look at that bacon on her ribs, look at that ham slowly developping on her behind! She doesn't know that she is getting nearer and nearer to the oven!"
However, there was way less exciting for Hansa progress. The thin girl was still small and not ounce of fat was on her. Gretel has blooming lovehandles while Hansa didn't have anything. The progress was too slow to the taste of the witch. If the girl didn't start gaining soon, she will have to do something...
11412.title: A month later

choices: The witch propose a gain contest between the girls
114121.content:
Two weeks of feeding later, and Gretel was now chubby. Well, chubby wasn't fair. The girl was a few pounds away of becoming a bona fide fat. The results were obvious: Gretel was eating so much! Granny had never seen a pig so eager to get to the oven. It seems Gretel was perfectly fine with fattening herself into a big juicy piece of meat.
Her lovehandles were overflowing her waisband. Her sister Hansa couln't resist to grab her sister by the hips:
- Well, my sister! Someone is gettinga little chubby! she teased.
Gretel's bulging cheeks reddened. Hansa lifted her hands from Gretel's hips and took two handfuls of the pudge along her sides
- You really have gotten plump since you got here, maybe you should be watching what you eat!
Gretel belly was starting to hang also. Her thighs were now touching together and the girl really started to look like a Thanksgiving turker when naked. Granny was pretty proud of her progress.
Hansa did seems to gain a bit in the last two weeks, but she was still pretty thin. A soft layer of fat was developping on her belly, but nothing more.
"It's time to act" thought the evil witch while grinning.
114121.title: Two weeks later

info.brief_description: A new take on an age old story.
info.description:
Keep it pg 13
No slob stuff
No male weight gain
Keep the gain within some reason. I understand there may be magical weight gain, but don't make a girl gain too fast.
Feel free to introduce girls from other fairy tales, as long as the two originals are still main characters.
Have fun
